sah þan was sa Barabba waidedja.
JOHN 19.1 þanuh þan nam Peilatus Iesu jah usblaggw.
JOHN 19.2 jah þai gadrauhteis uswundun wipja us þaurnum jah galagidedun imma ana haubid jah wastjai paurpurodai gawasidedun ina, JOHN 19.3 jah qeþun:
JOHN 19.4 atiddja aftra ut Peilatus jah qaþ im:
sai, attiuha izwis ina ut, ei witeiþ þatei in imma ni ainohun fairino bigat.
JOHN 19.5 þaruh usiddja ut Iesus bairands þana þaurneinan waip jah þo paurpurodon wastja.
JOHN 19.6 þaruh biþe seƕun ina þai maistans gudjans jah andbahtos, hropidedun qiþandans:
iþ ik fairina in imma ni bigita.
weis witoþ aihum, jah bi þamma witoda unsaramma skal gaswiltan, unte sik silban gudis sunu gatawida.
JOHN 19.8 biþe gahausida Peilatus þata waurd, mais ohta sis.
JOHN 19.9 jah galaiþ in praitauriaun aftra jah qaþ du Iesua:
iþ Iesus andawaurdi ni gaf imma.
niu waist þatei waldufni aih ushramjan þuk jah waldufni aih fraletan þuk?
ni aihtedeis waldufnje ainhun ana mik, nih wesi þus atgiban iupaþro;
duhþe sa galewjands mik þus maizein frawaurht habaid.
JOHN 19.12 framuh þamma sokida Peilatus fraletan ina.
jabai þana fraletis, ni is frijonds kaisara;
saƕazuh izei þiudan sik silban taujiþ, andstandiþ kaisara.
ROM 6.23 þo auk launa frawaurhtais dauþus;
iþ ansts gudis libains aiweino in Xristau Iesu, fraujin unsaramma.
ROM 7.1 þau niu wituþ, broþrjus kunnandam auk witoþ rodja, þatei witoþ fraujinoþ mann, swa lagga ƕeila swe libaiþ?
ROM 7.2 jah auk ufwaira qens at libandin abin gabundana ist witoda;
aþþan jabai gaswiltiþ aba, galausjada af þamma witoda abins.
ROM 7.3 þannu þan at libandin abin haitada horinondei, jabai wairþiþ waira anþaramma;
iþ jabai gaswiltiþ wair, frija ist þis witodis, ei ni sijai horinondei waurþana abin anþaramma.
ROM 7.4 swaei nu jah jus, broþrjus meinai, afdauþidai waurþuþ witoda þairh leik Xristaus, ei wairþaiþ anþaramma, þamma us dauþaim urreisandin, ei akran bairaima guda.
ROM 7.5 þan auk wesum in leika, winnons frawaurhti þos þairh witoþ waurhtedun in liþum unsaraim du akran bairan dauþau;
ROM 7.6 iþ nu, sai, andbundanai waurþum af witoda, gadauþnandans in þammei gahabaidai wesum, swaei skalkinoma in niujiþai ahmins jah ni fairniþai bokos.
ak frawaurht ni ufkunþedjau nih þairh witoþ, unte lustu nih wissedjau, nih witoþ qeþi:
ROM 7.8 iþ lew nimandei frawaurhts þairh anabusn gawaurhta in mis allana lustu;
unte inu witoþ frawaurhts was nawis.
ROM 7.9 iþ ik qius was inu witoþ simle, iþ qimandein anabusnai frawaurhts gaqiunoda;
ROM 7.10 iþ ik gadauþnoda, jah bigitana warþ mis anabusns, sei was du libainai, wisan du dauþau.
ROM 7.11 unte frawaurhts lew nimandei þairh anabusn uslutoda mik, jah þairh þo usqam.
ROM 7.12 aþþan nu sweþauh witoþ weihata jah anabusns weiha jah garaihta jah þiuþeiga.
ROM 7.13 þata nu þiuþeigo warþ mis dauþus?
ak frawaurhts ei uskunþa waurþi frawaurhts, þairh þata þiuþeigo mis gawaurkjandei dauþu, ei waurþi ufarassau frawaurhta frawaurhts þairh anabusn.
ROM 7.14 witum auk þatei witoþ ahmein ist;
iþ ik leikeins im, frabauhts uf frawaurht.
unte ni þatei wiljau tauja, ak þatei fija þata tauja.
ROM 7.16 iþ jabai þatei ni wiljau þata tauja, gaqiss im witoda þatei goþ.
